Enum.Name: Reset Cause
Enum.EnumValues: LowPowerMgmt, WindowWatchdog, IndependentWatchdog, Software, PowerOn, NrstPin, Brownout

Variable.Name: Overcurrent
Variable.Description: True if there is an overcurrent on any channel

Variable.Name: Undercurrent
Variable.Description: True if there is an undercurrent on any channel

Struct.Name: Signals
Struct.Description: Signals to other boards about PDU state.

Enum.Name: Power State
Enum.Description: Which source is the battery getting power from, or if its transitioning.

Struct.Name: Parameters
Struct.Description: The current parameters of the device

Variable.Name: FRAM Configured
Variable.Description: If true then FRAM values were already set to defaults

Variable.Name: Reset FRAM
Variable.Description: If true then FRAM will be reset after next restart.

Variable.Name: Save to Fram
Variable.Description: Write current parameter values to fram.

Variable.Name: DCDC Switch Timeout
Variable.Description: The maximum time it takes for the DCDC to turn on.

Struct.Name: Limits
Struct.Description: Limits on the state of the PDD (state voltage etc)

Variable.Name: Max Current
Variable.Description: Generic output current maximum. Actual current max is the min of the general and channel specific limit.

Variable.Name: PCM Max Current
Variable.Description: PCM output current maximum. Actual current max is the min of the general and channel specific limit.

Variable.Name: Accumulator Manangement System Connected over CAN
Powertrain Control Module Connected over CAN

Enum.Name: Reset Cause
Enum.EnumValues: LowPowerMgmt, WindowWatchdog, IndependentWatchdog, Software, PowerOn, NrstPin, Brownout

Enum.Name: Drive Modes
Enum.EnumValues: Autocross, Endurance, Acceleration, Skidpad, Easy, Autonomous, LastIndex

Variable.Name: Timestamp
Variable.Description: timestamp the MOC state was last updated

Variable.Name: Device State
Variable.Description: 0 - initialization complete, 1 - initialization active, 3 - no data

Variable.Name: Precharged
Variable.Description: 0 - precharge active, 1 - precharged complete, 3 - no data

Variable.Name: Error Code
Variable.Description: 0 - no error, [1, 65535] - error message (look up in manual)

Repeat.Name: Motor
Repeat.Description: data from motor controller about the motors

Variable.Name: Timestamp
Variable.Description: timestamp the motor state was last updated

Variable.Name: Inverter Status
Variable.Description: 0 - power section inhibited, 1 - power section enabled, 3 - no data

Variable.Name: Inverter Ready
Variable.Description: 0 - inverter not ready, 1 - inverter ready, 3 - no data

Variable.Name: Error Status
Variable.Description: 0 - no error, 1 - error, 2 - warning, 3 - no data

Variable.Name: Front Load Cell
Variable.Description: data from the front load cell

Variable.Name: Rear Load Cell
Variable.Description: data from the rear load cell

Struct.Name: Profile
Struct.Description: The current parameters of the device

Variable.Name: Test BSPD
Variable.Description: Disables the accel and brake implausibility, allowing the BSPD to trigger

Variable.Name: Range Low
Variable.Description: Value when the accel pedal is released

Variable.Name: Range High
Variable.Description: Value when the accel pedal is pressed

Variable.Name: Range Low
Variable.Description: Value when the accel pedal is released

Variable.Name: Range High
Variable.Description: Value when the accel pedal is pressed

Variable.Name: Range Low
Variable.Description: Value when the brake pedal is released

Variable.Name: Range High
Variable.Description: Value when the brake pedal is pressed

Variable.Name: Range Low
Variable.Description: Value when the brake pedal is released

Variable.Name: Range High
Variable.Description: Value when the brake pedal is pressed

Variable.Name: Brake Start
Variable.Description: Must press brake this far to start the car

Variable.Name: Regen Start Speed
Variable.Description: when regen starts on the pedal

Variable.Name: Accel Exponent
Variable.Description: Raise accelerator to this power to make it drive better

Variable.Name: Maximum Power
Variable.Description: The maximum power the PCM will try to command

Variable.Name: Maximum Regen Power
Variable.Description: The maximum regenerative power the PCM will try to command

Variable.Name: Weight Transfer
Variable.Description: A ratio of the amount of weight transfer at maximum acceleration. 0 for no weight transfer and .5 for all of the weight on the front/back. Should be CoG/wheel base, assuming 1g.

Variable.Name: Limp Acceleration Limit
Variable.Description: The maximum acceleration for limp mode

Variable.Name: Limp State of Charge Threshold
Variable.Description: Limp mode is active below this state of charge

Variable.Name: Ready To Drive Sound Start Beeps
Variable.Description: The number of beeps in the ready to drive sound

Variable.Name: Accumulator Management System Connected over CAN
Power Distribution Unit Connected over CAN

Enum.Name: Reset Cause
Enum.EnumValues: LowPowerMgmt, WindowWatchdog, IndependentWatchdog, Software, PowerOn, NrstPin, Brownout

Variable.Name: Start Time
Variable.Description: The last time the board reset

Variable.Name: Cell Count
Variable.Description: The number of cells in the pack

Variable.Name: thermistor Count
Variable.Description: The number of thermistors in the pack

Variable.Name: Chip Count
Variable.Description: The number of chips in the pack

Variable.Name: Sensor
Variable.Description: Any of the pack errors has occurred (see pack errors below)

Variable.Name: Comm
Variable.Description: Communicating with the slaves timed out

Variable.Name: Post
Variable.Description: An error occurred configuring the slaves

Variable.Name: Ref
Variable.Description: Reading from the slave analog pins failed

Variable.Name: Over Current
Variable.Description: The tractive system was over current

Variable.Name: Under Current
Variable.Description: The tractive system was under current

Variable.Name: Over Voltage
Variable.Description: The tractive system was over voltage

Variable.Name: Under Voltage
Variable.Description: The tractive system was under voltage

Variable.Name: Over Power
Variable.Description: The tractive system was over power

Variable.Name: Under Power
Variable.Description: The tractive system was under power (this is negative when current flows into the pack)

Variable.Name: Over Temperature
Variable.Description: A temperature thermistor is over temperature

Variable.Name: Under Temperature
Variable.Description: A temperature thermistor is under temperature

Variable.Name: Over GLV Board Temperature
Variable.Description: The AMS PCB is over temperature

Variable.Name: Under GLV Board Temperature
Variable.Description: The AMS PCB is under temperature

Variable.Name: Over HV Board Temperature
Variable.Description: The AMS PCB is over temperature

Variable.Name: Under HV Board Temperature
Variable.Description: The AMS PCB is under temperature

Variable.Name: Over Die Temperature
Variable.Description: A slave IC is over temperature

Variable.Name: Under Die Temperature
Variable.Description: A slave IC is under temperature

Variable.Name: Vsense Mismatch
Variable.Description: The error between the stack sum and overall pack measurements is too large

Variable.Name: Over Charge Current
Variable.Description: The cells are charging too quickly

Variable.Name: Discharge while Charging
Variable.Description: The cells are discharging while the charger is connected

Variable.Name: AMS Fault Latch
Variable.Description: The AMS fault latch has been set. The car must be restarted for this to clear.

Variable.Name: IMD Fault Latch
Variable.Description: The IMD fault latch has been set. The car must be restarted for this to clear.

Variable.Name: Start Delay
Variable.Description: AMS Hardware fault start delay signal.

Variable.Name: Current
Variable.Description: The current running through the pack

Variable.Name: Voltage
Variable.Description: The voltage on the other side of the AIRs

Variable.Name: Power
Variable.Description: The power supplied by the pack

Variable.Name: Current L
Variable.Description: The currentL signal from the current sensor is out of range

Variable.Name: Current H
Variable.Description: The currentH signal from the current sensor is out of range

Variable.Name: Voltage
Variable.Description: The measured pack voltage is out of range

Variable.Name: Capacity Init
Variable.Description: The stored pack capacity is out of range

Variable.Name: Soc Init
Variable.Description: The stored state of charge is out of range

Variable.Name: Start
Variable.Description: One of the above errors occured during initialization (TODO: remove this)

Enum.Name: Status
Enum.EnumValues: Off, Normal, UnderVoltage, SpeedStart, Error, GroundError, Invalid

Struct.Name: Board
Struct.Description: Updates from sensors on the board

Variable.Name: GLV Board Temperature
Variable.Description: The temperature on the GLV part of the board

Variable.Name: HV Board Temperature
Variable.Description: The temperature of the HV part of the board

Variable.Name: Voltage
Variable.Description: The sum of the cell voltages

Variable.Name: Balancing
Variable.Description: Indicates whether cell balancing is occuring

Struct.Name: MMA
Struct.Description: Holds min, max, average for each data field

Repeat.Name: MinMaxAvg
Repeat.Prefixes: cellV, temp, intRef, dieTemp, Vana, Vdd, chipCellSum

Variable.Name: Charge Current
Variable.Description: Time tracker on current during charging

Struct.Name: Profile
Struct.Description: The current parameters of the device

Variable.Name: relayTractiveDisableTime
Variable.Description: The amount of time the shutdown circuit is detected as low while the AIRs are drawing a lot of startup current

Variable.Name: Powertrain Control Module Connected over CAN
